name: currentNYCweather
0:
”Alexa, open big apple weather”
”current weather”
”current conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: big apple weather
des: This skill gives the current temperature for NYC. This is useful for people who live in NYC and in the greater NYC area and Tri-State Area.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
